2024
Admission Ongoing!

Start Equiry ViaWhatsApp

UPSS Comprehensive College

Citadel of academic learning

Ogunsola Chioma (Mrs)

Principal

Welcome

UPSS Comprehensive College has a long tradition of excellence in serving the educational needs of young individuals in Nigeria. We believe that every child can succeed and we work very hard to ensure that they do.

We offer quality and all-around education which provides students with academic excellence and good character. Education without character is nothing, that’s why we instill sound moral and social values in our students.

We prepare our students to pursue their future dreams and goals by providing a solid academic foundation and a holistic education where students of all academic abilities are helped to achieve their potential. This is coupled with a broad extra-curricular programme that reaches out to the many varied interests of all students.

With an excellent team of dedicated, intelligent, and hardworking staff, our students are well-equipped with skills and confidence to face the future.

We look forward to welcoming you to UPSS Comprehensive College.

Academic Curricular

Our curriculum is based on the Nigerian educational system, having three junior sections (JSS1 – JSS3) and three senior sections (SSS1 – SSS3).

We offer the following subjects:

  1. Languages (English, French, Yoruba)
  2. Arts (History, Government, Literature, Christian Religious Studies)
  3. Science and Mathematics (Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Mathematics, Further Mathematics, Computer Science, Technical Drawing, Basic Science and Technology)
  4. Social Sciences (Economics, Geography, National Value Education)
  5. Vocational Studies (Agricultural Science, Home Economics)
  6. Business Studies (Financial Accounting, Commerce, Book Keeping)

Co-Curricular

We offer the following Curriculum Enrichment subjects such as:

  • Financial literacy where students are taught personal finance and money management skills.
  • Study skills (learning how to learn) where students are taught how to study.
  • Critical thinking where students are taught to think clearly, logically, and independently to proffer solutions to problems.
  • Leadership skills
  • Character Education

Extracurricular activities: Clubs and societies (Jet club, Chess club, press club, swimming, etc.

Our Facilities

Chemistry Laboratory

Physics Laboratory

Transport

Biology Laboratory

Class Block

Results

Visit the results portal here

Testimonials

UPSS Comprehensive College is a school that believes strongly in the individual talents of every child. A school that discovers and enhances the potential of every student while inculcating untradeable academic knowledge. Schooling here has contributed immensely to my moral and academic growth and development. I would not trade my experience here at Pacific for anything in the world.
Odeyiany Naomi AhuoizaEx-student
They say that the longer you stay in a place, the more impact it'll have on you. That is what Pacific has done to me. It has impacted me positively in academics and even socially. At Pacific, I have been encouraged to join a number of clubs and societies, which I never felt motivated to do until I came to Pacific. I have also had a profound educational improvement thanks to Pacific College, so much so I achieved an outstanding WAEC result. I thank Pacific for the changes in me. It doesn't just change a person; it changes that person for the better.
Ibhaze DivineEx-student
UPSS Comprehensive College challenged me academically, pushing me to develop strong study habits and critical thinking skills. It also introduced me to lifelong friends who have been source of support and companionship. Overtly, my secondary school experience has left me with lasting friendships and the tools I need to excel in my higher education and beyond.
Amos EmmanuelEx-student
Pacific has been a very amazing school. It has become such a part of the journey of my life that I can never forget the amazing teachers who never failed to spare time to know if their students understood a particular topic and also apply facilities that make learning easier. It has been a very wonderful experience. I can't also forget the extracurricular activities that helped me participate in things I never thought I could do. And lastly, I can't forget the amazing friends I made at UPSS Schools.
Odubanjo Favour.Ex-student
Over the past three years of my life, UPSS Comprehensive College has given me a very nice experience. The environment, the teachers and the students have all greeted me well and contributed heavily to my secondary school years. Attending Pacific was really an impeccable decision on my part.
Abubakary HalimatEx-student

UPSS Schools is here to make it a reality! Secure a spot for the 2024 admissions scholarship entrance exam.
Register here
